title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After performing the steps mentioned in the SR, the Navigator adds the file in the specified location but without showing the file extension.
EB: After performing the steps mentioned in the SR, the Navigator should add the file in the specified location with the correct file extension shown.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename, but ignore the extension field, which isn't requested
7) Click Ok
